body.p:
Albany Kentucky
January 7th 1861 --
Hon Beriah Magoffin Governor of Kentucky,
Dear Sir:

I enclose to you the petition of James Ferguson for your clemency -- the petition is signed by some of whom you are perhaps acquainted viz: J. M. Elder, Jno Groom, J. M. Gwinn and JA. M. Elder. The petition is also accompanied with the affidavits of J. G. Crockett, Reuben Hurt and A. T. Harper --
If it is your pleasure to remit the fines, you can enclose the pardon to me --
